item.title: BMW E39: Trunk Release Handle Replacement
item.description: Today I replaced the trunk release pushbutton in my 2001 540i/6. Here is how I did it. Objective: Replace the trunk release pushbutton due to deteriorated rubber covering failing. Applicable Vehicles: 1996-2003 BMW E39 5-series: 520i, 523i, 525i, 528i, 530i, 535i, 540i, M5. Parts required: Release Handle 51248168035 Cost: $85 Difficulty: Low Time Required: 15 minutes. Procedure: To see how to do this for yourself, watch the embedded video below!
